cause.description:
"The Quality Music Revolution is the very best kind of revolution: joyful, painless and nonviolent." We're here to promote the fantastic music that is being made by unknowns on today's musical scene. In a world where the airwaves are saturated primarily by the likes of Nickelback and Justin Timberlake (no offense...much), we all know that the little independent groups deserve a chance. Furthermore, if they don't get that chance soon, quality music could get inextricably buried beneath the overwhelming commercial success of the mass-produced garbage that's permeating radio stations and the shelves of record stores.
Join the Quality Music Revolution and get the word out about the great independent bands in your area!
1. Music = Life.
2. Empty Music = Empty Life.
3. Quality Music = Quality Life.
4. Join our Group: http://hs.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2386904724
cause.mission: To create, discover, and get the word out about quality music.
cause.name: Quality Music Revolution
